module.name: Bulk Handler
module.description: Bulk Handler manages the bulk export or import of extensions, DIDs, user manager users, user manager groups, and contacts. You can export any of these as a CSV file. You can also upload a CSV file to save time versus having to enter each item individually. The module provides required/recommended headers for your CSV files.
module.changelog: *13.0.23* Packaging of ver 13.0.23 *13.0.22* Packaging of ver 13.0.22 *13.0.21* Packaging of ver 13.0.21 *13.0.20* Bugfix/FREEI-1502 bulk handler issue with call accounting module *13.0.19* FREEI-1502 Bulk handler issue with call accounting module *13.0.18* FREEI-1090 Error message when exceeding license count *13.0.17* FREEI-1264 Importing Dialpatterns entries through bulkhandler by setting Skip Validation to Yes does not give option to return back to the Bulkhandler page. *13.0.16* FREEI-913 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *13.0.15* Use lazy loading console commands *13.0.14.8* Improvement/FREEPBX-18409 *13.0.14.7* FREEPBX-17774 Bulk Handler (cli version) does not update extension name *13.0.14.6* Alert changed to innerHTML messages *13.0.14.5* FREEPBX-15499 Need to add a checklist for Required fields while uploading bulk handler and do proper error handling. *13.0.14.4* FREEPBX-13927 Fix action bindings on import *13.0.14.3* FREEPBX-12760 Importing with Bulk Import of extension causes issues in Tech column *13.0.14.2* FREEPBX-13642 Prefer localStorage over (deprecated) cookies *13.0.14.1* FREEPBX-13051 When importing ignore null line, FREEPBX-13131 Fix action icons in card view during validation *13.0.14* FREEPBX-11563 remember last tab selection and go back there *13.0.13* Dont id the same as the real importer *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10077 added edit functionality and better workflows *13.0.11* Add fwconsole import. Update navigation. *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10241 better error reporting when files are invalid *13.0.9* FREEPBX-9952 Errors in Bulk Handler extension import/export *13.0.8* FREEPBX-9596 Add cancel option when importing in Bulk Handler *13.0.6* Require Asterisk to be running *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9712 add progress bar and use action bar *13.0.5* Fix invalid looping errors *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9594 slightly better name for exported file *13.0.3* Fixes to functionality *13.0.2* Initial release to the world!
